# InspireHome — Furniture & Home Decor Store

> InspireHome (inspirehome.gr) is a Greek online furniture and home decor store based in Thessaloniki, Greece. We sell sofas, armchairs, tables, beds, lighting, storage furniture, office furniture, outdoor furniture, children's furniture, and decorative items.

## About

InspireHome offers a curated selection of high-quality furniture and home decoration products for every room of the house. Our catalog includes over 5,000 products sourced from top European suppliers.

- **Location:** Thessaloniki, Greece (Εθνικής Αμύνης 15, 54621)
- **Languages:** Greek (primary), English
- **Currency:** EUR (€)
- **Shipping:** Free shipping on orders over €100 within Greece
- **Returns:** 14-day return policy
- **Warranty:** 2-year warranty on all furniture
- **Business hours:** Mon-Fri 09:00-20:00, Sat 10:00-18:00

## Product Categories

- **Καθιστικό (Living Room):** Sofas, armchairs, coffee tables, TV stands, rugs
- **Υπνοδωμάτιο (Bedroom):** Beds, mattresses, wardrobes, nightstands, dressers
- **Τραπεζαρία (Dining Room):** Dining tables, chairs, sideboards, bar stools
- **Γραφείο (Office):** Desks, office chairs, bookshelves, file cabinets
- **Παιδικό (Kids):** Children's beds, desks, storage, playroom furniture
- **Αποθήκευση (Storage):** Shelving units, cabinets, organizers
- **Εξωτερικού Χώρου (Outdoor):** Garden furniture, patio sets, outdoor lighting
- **Διακόσμηση (Decor):** Lighting, mirrors, vases, cushions, wall art

## Key Pages

- Homepage: https://inspirehome.gr/
- About Us: https://inspirehome.gr/about
- Contact: https://inspirehome.gr/contact
- FAQ: https://inspirehome.gr/faq
- Shipping & Policies: https://inspirehome.gr/info
- Product Catalog (JSON): https://inspirehome.gr/data/liberta-products.json

## Structured Data

Every product page includes schema.org Product structured data with:
- Product name, description, images
- Price and sale price in EUR
- Availability (InStock / OutOfStock)
- Shipping details (free within Greece)
- Return policy (14 days)
- Color, material, dimensions when available

The FAQ page includes FAQPage schema for rich snippet eligibility.
The site includes Organization schema (FurnitureStore type) with address and business hours.

## Contact Information

- **Phone:** +30 2310 000 000
- **Email:** info@inspirehome.gr
- **Address:** Εθνικής Αμύνης 15, Θεσσαλονίκη 54621, Greece
- **Facebook:** https://www.facebook.com/inspire.home.kaplantzis/

## Technical Details

- Single-page application (React) with client-side routing
- Product data available as JSON at /data/liberta-products.json
- Dynamic XML sitemap at /api/sitemap.xml
- Microsoft Clarity for analytics
